name.en: Cosmo Queen, the Queen of Prayers
name.ja: <ruby>祈<rt>いの</rt></ruby>りの<ruby>女<rt>じょ</rt></ruby><ruby>王<rt>おう</rt></ruby>－コスモクイーン

text.en:
If a Field Spell Card is activated: You can Special Summon this card from your hand in Defense Position. You can target 1 face-up card in the Field Zone, then activate this effect based on its controller;
● You: Destroy it, and if you do, add 1 Field Spell with a different name from your Deck to your hand.
● Your opponent: Negate its effects (until the end of this turn), and if you do, add 1 Field Spell from your Deck to your hand.
You can only use each effect of "Cosmo Queen, the Queen of Prayers" once per turn.
